item.title: Microservice: First attempt
item.description: This article records my first attempt with mircro-service using Netflix Eureka as service register and discovery center, and Spring cloud Gateway as the API gateway. P.S. It’s so dumb that our instructor asked us to use Zuul as the gateway component, which has been deprecated since Spring Boot 2. 1.
